requirements.summary: Update the Home page greeting heading to use “Welcome to your growth space” while still showing the anonymous username.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx), the heading currently rendered as “Welcome back, {username}” is updated so the visible phrase “Welcome back” no longer appears.
The new heading includes the exact phrase “Welcome to your growth space” and still includes the user’s anonymous username (when available).
No other screens’ copy is changed as part of this request.

file_operations.description: Change the welcome <h1> microcopy from “Welcome back, {username}” to “Welcome to your growth space, {username}” (or equivalent rendering) while keeping the username display behavior intact; ensure only this Home heading text changes and keep all user-facing text in English. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
